title: Amber Rose heads out for a date night with boyfriend Alexander 'AE' Edwards
text:
Amber Rose was pictured heading out on a date night at Canoga Park in LA with her boyfriend Alexander 'AE' Edwards on Monday night.

The 36-year-old gave birth to their first child together, Slash Electric Alexander Edwards just 11 days ago but it looks as though Amber is taking to motherhood like to duck to water the second time around.

The model is already mother to Sebastian Taylor Thomaz, six, from her three year marriage to Wiz Khalifa.

Way to go! Amber Rose headed out for a date night in Canoga Park in LA with boyfriend Alexander 'AE' Edwards (right) on Monday just 11 days after giving birth to Slash Electric

Wonder woman: Amber looked fresh-faced as she headed out with her man and her bodyguard (left) as she showed she is fantastic at multi-tasking

Amber looked fresh-faced as she stepped out wearing a baseball cap and a grey hoodie teamed with leather leggings.

Her green-haired lover, 32, who she started dating last year, despite meeting in 2018, was casually dressed in jeans and a black jacket.

They weren't alone on the night as they also had Amber's long-term security guard with them, who was sporting a bleached blond buzz-cut.

Taking a moment: Amber teamed leather leggings with trainers and a grey hoodie for her outing

AE announced Slash's arrival with a sweet Instagram post after he was born.

'The world is urs now,' he wrote in the caption. 'thank u, Amber Rose, for loving me so much that u put ur body thru it 2 bring my sun [sic] in2 the world. I could never be as strong as u. Slash a rockstar.'

Edwards oversees Artistic Development at Def Jam and the couple announced they were expecting a baby together on April 3.

Adorable: AE announced Slash's arrival with a sweet Instagram post after he was born

Amber wrote on Instagram at the time: 'SUPER excited to announce that we have a Sweet little Baby Boy on the way! P.S Sebastian is soooooo Happy to be a big brother

In May, Amber divulged that she suffers from hyperemesis gravidarum, 'a condition characterized by severe nausea, vomiting, weight loss, and electrolyte disturbance,' according to the American Pregnancy Association.

'I want to be cute. I want to show off my belly, but I just can’t get off this couch!' Amber said in an Instagram video in May.

'I’m tired, and I just want to barf all day, it’s just not fun. But it’s totally worth it.'

Bond: Amber is also mother to Sebastian (right), six, from her marriage to Wiz Khalifa
description: Amber Rose was pictured heading out on a date night at Canoga Park in LA with her boyfriend Alexander 'AE' Edwards on Monday night.
